text: @WinningWwg1wga @kathygriffin Lot's of hospitals do.  However, what kind of hospital puts an isolation mask on someone with  #COVID19 symptoms?  Most hospitals immediately put patients with those kinds of symptoms on O2 (i.e. non-rebreather).  She must not have the symptoms (low SP02).  Could be psychogenic.
